name: Spellcraft Chronicles
description:
This is a platformer where you can't jump. 

*confused player* But how do I you know... JUMP ONTO PLATFORMS

 Simple , you launch yourself into the air like a human pinball.

*confused player* ...ok soo ... what about enemies....

Bouncing off  them is not enough , you gotta spin like a spaz while bouncing to defeat them.

*confused player* oh... like sonic. Ok got it so far

And when you defeat them you get to replace one of your body parts with theirs to gain their stats.

*confused player* What...

Also you fight against giant cyborg cats that shoot lasers

*confused player* WHAT?

Have fun ^_^  

Also you can check out the code here :

https://github.com/InsanityIncStudio/SpellCraftChronicles.git
